trans-unit.source: Specifies the security settings for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的安全性設定<xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: This class specifies the kind of security to be applied to the `wsFederationHttpBinding` binding and the specific security settings.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別指定的安全性套用至類型`wsFederationHttpBinding`繫結與特定安全性設定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the message security settings for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示訊息安全性設定<xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The object returned specifies detailed message-level security properties for the `wsFederationHttpBinding`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的物件指定詳細的訊息層級安全性屬性`wsFederationHttpBinding`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of security to be applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要套用的安全性類型。

trans-unit.source: The enumeration member returned specifies which general type of security is to be applied.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的列舉成員指定所要套用的一般安全性的類型。

trans-unit.source: The allowed values are <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>.
trans-unit.target: 允許的值為<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> security mode, the message is sent over HTTP and SOAP message security is used to protect the message.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>安全性模式，訊息會傳送透過 HTTP 和 SOAP 訊息安全性用來保護訊息。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: Client authentication is performed based on the issued token obtained from the security token service.
trans-unit.target: 根據從安全性權杖服務取得核發的權杖來執行用戶端驗證。

trans-unit.source: Server authentication is based on the server's certificate.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器驗證根據伺服器的憑證。

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> security mode, the message is sent over HTTPS.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>安全性模式，透過 HTTPS 傳送的訊息。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: Client authentication is performed by including the issued token obtained from the security token service in the SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端驗證是由包括從 SOAP 訊息中的安全性權杖服務取得核發的權杖執行。

trans-unit.source: Server authentication, based on the server's certificate, is performed as part of the HTTPS connection setup.
trans-unit.target: 根據伺服器憑證的伺服器驗證是 HTTPS 連線安裝程序執行。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message*>屬性已經從其預設值，且應該序列化。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message*>屬性值應該序列化，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Mode*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Mode*>屬性已經從其預設值，且應該序列化。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Mode*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Mode*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Mode*>屬性值應該序列化，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Mode*>
